* clone vs pull
  * clone when you don't have a local copy
  * pull when you do have a local copy


* to link your git account, use Terminal in RStudio, and enter these commands sequentially:
  * git config --global user.name 'Jane Doe'
  * git config --global user.email 'jane@example.com'
  * git config --global --list
